dialogue.text: Hi! How can I help you today?
dialogue.zh: 嗨!今天有什麼可以幫到您的嗎？\こんにちは！今日はどんなご用件でしょうか？

dialogue.text: Hi, I don’t feel well.
dialogue.zh:
嗨, 我 don’t feel well.
こんにちは, 私 don’t feel well.

dialogue.text: I’m sorry to hear that. What symptoms do you have?
dialogue.zh:
我’m sorry to hear that. What symptoms 你 有?
私’m sorry to hear that. What symptoms do あなた have?

dialogue.text: I have a sore throat and a runny nose.
dialogue.zh:
我 有 a sore throat and a runny nose.
私 have a sore throat and a runny nose.

dialogue.text: Do you have a fever?
dialogue.zh:
你 有 a 發燒?
Do あなた have a 熱?

dialogue.text: No fever, just tired.
dialogue.zh:
不 發燒, just tired.
いいえ 熱, just tired.

dialogue.text: How long have you felt this way?
dialogue.zh:
How long 有 你 felt this way?
How long have あなた felt this way?

dialogue.text: Since yesterday.
dialogue.zh:
Since yesterday.
Since yesterday.

dialogue.text: Do you have any allergies to medicine?
dialogue.zh:
你 有 任何 allergies to 藥?
Do あなた have any allergies to 薬?

dialogue.text: No, I don’t.
dialogue.zh:
不, 我 don’t.
いいえ, 私 don’t.

dialogue.text: Do you prefer tablets or syrup?
dialogue.zh:
你 prefer tablets or syrup?
Do あなた prefer tablets or syrup?

dialogue.text: Tablets are fine.
dialogue.zh:
Tablets 是 fine.
Tablets are fine.

dialogue.text: I recommend a cold medicine for daytime.
dialogue.zh:
我 recommend a cold 藥 daytime.
私 recommend a cold 薬 for daytime.

dialogue.text: Okay.
dialogue.zh:
好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you need something for your throat too?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 東西 your throat too?
Do あなた 必要 something for your throat too?

dialogue.text: Yes, maybe lozenges.
dialogue.zh:
是的, maybe lozenges.
はい, maybe lozenges.

dialogue.text: These lozenges can help with soreness.
dialogue.zh:
These lozenges 可以 幫忙 with soreness.
These lozenges できます 手伝う with soreness.

dialogue.text: Great.
dialogue.zh:
太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Are you taking any other medication?
dialogue.zh:
是 你 taking 任何 other medication?
Are あなた taking any other medication?

dialogue.text: No.
dialogue.zh:
不.
いいえ.

dialogue.text: Take this after meals, twice a day.
dialogue.zh:
Take this after meals, twice a day.
Take this after meals, twice a day.

dialogue.text: Got it.
dialogue.zh:
Got it.
Got it.

dialogue.text: Drink plenty of water and rest.
dialogue.zh:
Drink plenty of 水 and rest.
Drink plenty of 水 and rest.

dialogue.text: I will.
dialogue.zh:
我 will.
私 will.

dialogue.text: If you get a fever, see a doctor.
dialogue.zh:
If 你 get a 發燒, see a doctor.
If あなた get a 熱, see a doctor.

dialogue.text: Okay, thanks.
dialogue.zh:
好的, 謝謝.
わかりました, ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Would you like a small pack or a full pack?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like a 小 pack or a full pack?
Would あなた like a スモール pack or a full pack?

dialogue.text: A small pack is fine.
dialogue.zh:
A 小 pack 是 fine.
A スモール pack 私 fine.

dialogue.text: Alright, I’ll ring that up for you.
dialogue.zh:
Alright, 我’ll ring that up 你.
Alright, 私’ll ring that up for あなた.

dialogue.text: Thank you.
dialogue.zh:
謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.
